title: Bug: sometimes unable to drag tabs or close tabs, fixes on restart
content:
Running Firefox 140.3.1 ESR on Debian, lately I've been experiencing a bug when I have several instances of Firefox open, and multiple tabs open in each instance. After a few minutes of browsing and opening and closing tabs, I am unable to drag tabs to rearrange them (above the address bar). The "X" that is part of the tab also doesn't work to close the tab, and clicking the main "hamburger" menu icon (three horizontal lines) does not drop down the menu. If I switch to a different instance of Firefox that is already running, sometimes the "hamburger" menu icon starts working (sometimes not), and I am able to exit and restart Firefox, which works for awhile, and then a few minutes later the same thing happens again. Interestingly, when it's not working, I am still able to "right-click" on the tab and choose "close tab" from the drop-down menu.

I've been trying to discern a pattern, but have not been able to find a way to reliably reproduce the error. It often seems to happen when I'm using Reddit or Craigslist (maybe only more noticable because I often open and close a lot of tabs on those two sites). At one point I thought it might be related to opening a new tab for a site that had previously been opened in another Firefox window (instance), but that may be a false lead, because I haven't been able to find a way to consistently trigger the bug.

Thank you for maintaining the best privacy-respecting browser in the world, an indispensable tool for me.
creator: michaelf3

title: Re-subscribing to a site
content:
I no longer receive promotional email from Vitacost. I have already asked the company to look into this issue, but they have not had any success so far. At one point, a "global" hold or block wouldn't even let me get onto the site to make an order. Now I can, but still would like to know when there are sales.

Some months ago, Kroger took over Vitacost and I did try to prevent unnecessary mailings coming to the house when I skimmed over the Kroger privacy statement. I may have tried to block affiliate promotions without realizing that Vitacost would be affected.

Another possibility is that I inadvertently pressed the "Unsubscribe" button on gmail, which is easy to do. Today I read that there is no obvious way to undo the unsubscribe function. The steps suggested by Google to fix the problem do not seem to apply to the settings on my computer. Now Google automatically rejects all emails from Vitacost except for order confirmations.

Any suggestions? I am not particularly computer savvy, but can get help interpreting any answers you provide.

By the way, my husband's logo appears at the top of this form, but my email is janus42ts@gmail.com.

Janice Scott
creator: mscott4d

title: Windows 11 update
content: Hi I recently received an update on Windows 11 insider channel that blocked me from using Firefox and Google Chrome. It also refused to allow me to reinstall Firefox. It would not let open the browsers at all. I did everything possible-no child restrictions- no security issues-no issues with Microsoft redistributable packages. The only browser it would allow me to use was Explorer. I ended up doing a clean install of Windows 11 to fix the problem. I don’t think blocking a user from a web browser is legal but I’m not a lawyer. Thanks, Jonathan

content: Buongiorno, sono un utente vecchio e ipovedente di Firefox che è il mio browser primario e non riesco proprio a decifrare le scritte dei menu. ho trovato e provato con lo zoom e con la selezione della dimensione del carattere in impostazioni ma ha effetto solo nella pagina centrale, le barre restano per me non leggibili, sto usando una lente d'ingrandimento ma l'operazione è scomoda e non compatibile con un uso normale del browser. Mi dovrò rassegnare se non ci fosse soluzione a questo problema. va da sè che a quel punto mi vedrei costretto a disinstallare firefox non potendolo usare. grazie per la cortese attenzione Leo p.s.: il tasto mandami una email quando qualcuno risponderà a questo problema non risulta attivabile prego cortesemente (visto che la mia attenzione comincia ad essere volatile) di voler comunicare direttamente la risposta eventuale a leopo@gmx.us. ancora grazie anticipate per supportare ed aiutare un vecchio che non molla! :-))

title: Can't purge obsolete bookmarks
content:
I am used to having a Firefox for my personal Mozilla account, bookmarks and sessions, and Firefox Developer Edition to be logged in my work account, where I could use everything I need to work in a separate environment.

Recently I changed a job. Logged out past-job@mail.com from Firefox Developer Edition, logged in with present-job@mail.com and... I still can see old bookmarks. 

- I cleared history and new bookmarks: nothing - went to about:preferences#privacy and clear all the data: bookmarks still there - tried Help > More troubleshooting information > Refresh Firefox…: all the same - reinstalled firefox@developer-edition with brew: nah - eventually, logged out from presetn-job@mail.com in Firefox Developer Edition and personal@mail.com in Firefox; uninstalled both, deleted everything related to "mozilla" and "firefox" was able to find in my system: unsuccessfully

The last thing I didn't try yet is burning my laptop in favor to a new one.

Where are those bookmarks? Why nothing is helping?

title: White bar at top of screen whenever a video is fullscreened

title: webAuthn
content:
Does Firefox support webAuthn passkeys stored by the browser? I have an app that I am working on and I would like to be able to use this feature.

If Firefox cannot store passkeys can you explain why this has not been added?
